trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for read/write server controls.
trans-unit.target: Extiende el comportamiento en tiempo de diseño para los controles del servidor de lectura o escritura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> clase está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> clase para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: This control designer provides the ability to drop controls onto the control for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Este diseñador de controles permite colocar controles en el control para este diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Implementers of designers who would like their control to support the addition of child controls should use <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Los implementadores de diseñadores que quiere que su control para admitir la adición de controles secundarios deben utilizar <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want your control to support child controls, use a designer derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Si no desea que el control para admitir controles secundarios, utilice un diseñador derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> clase está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> clase para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el código HTML que se usa para representar el control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Código HTML que se usa para representar el control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> clase está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> clase para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to map.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de la propiedad que se va a asignar.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Maps a property, including description and value, to an intrinsic HTML style.
trans-unit.target: Asigna una propiedad, incluidos su descripción y valor, a un estilo HTML intrínseco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: this method must be overridden in a derived class to implement the designer.
trans-unit.target: Este método debe invalidarse en una clase derivada para implementar el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Provides notification that is raised when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona una notificación que se produce cuando se adjunta un comportamiento al diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Utilice los miembros de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to map properties to styles.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> métodos en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad para asignar propiedades a estilos.

trans-unit.source: The object sending the event.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que envía el evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> object that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> que proporciona los datos para el evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controlará el evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged" /> de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> clase está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> clase para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event occurs after a property has been changed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> evento se produce después de que se ha modificado una propiedad.

trans-unit.source: This method allows implementers to do any processing that may be needed after a property change.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite a los implementadores a cabo los procesos que puedan ser necesarios después de un cambio de propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the display of the control.
trans-unit.target: Actualiza la presentación del control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> clase está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> clase para la funcionalidad del Diseñador de control equivalente.
